country_event = {
    id = 60016829
    title = "Leader Setup 2"
    desc = "This event will periodically set the country leader modifier across your national territory"
    picture = "news"

    trigger = {
        tag = JAN
        has_global_flag = leader_setup_complete
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        months = 1
    }

    option = {
        name = "Setting the Political Leader in all country territories..."
        any_country = {
            limit = {
                has_country_modifier = african_expert_diplomat
            }
            any_owned = { 
                limit = {
                    NOT = { has_province_modifier = capital_african_expert_diplomat }
                }
                remove_province_modifier = capital_african_expert_diplomat
				remove_province_modifier = capital_african_successful_industrialist
				remove_province_modifier = capital_african_ivory_tower_intellectual
